extendedInfo.description: Feel the force of a powerful virtual weapon in your hand like never before!Take a huge selection of the world's most popular gun's down the the shooting range and listen to over 40 authentic Gun Sounds.Feel the recoil as you blast bullet holes in 2 different target designs.Experience realistic muzzle flash effects everytime you unleash a round.Gun Sounds include:AK47 BerettaColt 1911 Desert Eagle Gatling Gun GlockM16 Shotgun Tommy Gun Winchester UziOVER 40 GUNS IN TOTAL! Download Gun Sounds today!
